nodes.text: Q'mara, located in the Q'mara system of the Juvex sector, was a desert planet with a number of shabby spaceports, where all manner of smugglers and thugs sought illicit employment. Juvex nobles frequented Q'mara's houses of ill repute; foolish ones were drawn into its subterranean gambling and spice dens, sometimes never to return. Qellrin was attacked by pirates near Q'mara.
